name: Platformer Game Demo
description:
This is a 2D Platformer Game Demo I've made using the Unity engine as part of my Interactive Art & Programming portfolio.

Credits Entire Game Demo: Jason Hilani Sprites: Keyboard Sprites: Dream Mix at https://dreammix.itch.io/ Every other Sprite: o_lobster at https://o-lobster.itch.io/
Sounds: GUI FX: Lokif at https://opengameart.org/content/gui-sound-effects Dash FX: Iwan Gabovitch at https://opengameart.org/content/swish-bamboo-stick-weapon-swhoshes Jump FX: Leohpaz at https://opengameart.org/content/12-player-movement-sfx Coin FX: WobbleBoxx at wobbleboxx.com 1UP and Damage FX: SubspaceAudio at https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style Death FX: Ogrebane at https://opengameart.org/content/ghost Music: Wolfgang at https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-forest-theme
ALL ASSETS ARE EITHER UNDER PUBLIC DOMAIN OR CREATIVE COMMONS LICENSES.
